title: New Beta
body:
Whenever I click to install the new beta client by clicking the upgrade button, it does not download and will not launch either.  It says to reinstall the alpha client.  Is there anyway for me to get the beta to work or should I just wait for the beta to end?
Thank you

replies.body:
This nasty error shows up if something went wrong the first time you attempted to upgrade. You should be able to resolve this by temporarily disabling any Firewall/Antivirus you have running, then head into your League installation folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends). Once inside this folder, delete the file named **LeagueClient.exe**, then launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (r-click, *run as administrator*). Once you've done this, you can attempt the upgrade process again.

Once the process finishes, you can re-enable your Firewall/Antivirus programs. Please let me know if this resolved the issue for you! ^.^
